title: Katie Price blasted over parenting as kids Jett and Bunny wreak havoc in hot tub
text:
Katie Price has come under fire for her parenting (Picture: Rex)

Katie Price has come under fire after letting youngest children Bunny and Jett loose in her hot tub.

The 41-year-old – who shares the little ones with ex Kieran Hayler – shared a photo of them wreaking havoc in her garden, as they lived their best lives with some bubbles.

The snap shows the little ones – and much of the garden – covered in bubbles, with toys strewn all over her grass.

Alongside the upload, she told her 2million followers: ‘Look at what Bunny and Jett did to my hot tub the other day…

‘Put my bath bombs in there bubbles EVERYWHERE but couldn’t tell them off as I actually thought it was funny.’

Basically any child’s dream day.

However, some didn’t find the snap ‘funny’, and accused the mum-of-five of not keeping a close enough eye on her kids.

‘You don’t leave the little ones unsupervised in the hot tub, do you? That’s a scary thought,’ one commented, while another said: ‘Your lucky they didn’t drown (sic).’

‘It is advisable that children of this age & pregnant woman aren’t allowed in hot tubs,’ an Instagram user wrote.

‘Great supervision of children around water and I didn’t think bath bombs made bubbles? More like washing up liquid to me,’ a follower posted.

But many, many more flooded her comments with positive messages, loving seeing the youngsters having fun.

‘They look happy most importantly,’ a fan explained, as one agreed: ‘Love this can’t beat a family fun day xx.’

A user added: ‘Children being allowed to be children.’

Metro.co.uk has contacted Katie’s reps for a comment.
